title: Smart Data Models - GovHydroWEH
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Woodward Electric Hydro Governor Model.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovHydroWEH

db.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Speed Dead Band (db). Default: 0.0

dicn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Value to allow the integral controller to advance beyond the gate limits (Dicn). Default: 0.0

dpv.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Value to allow the Pilot valve controller to advance beyond the gate limits (Dpv). Default: 0.0

dturb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine damping factor (Dturb).  Unit = delta P (PU of MWbase) / delta speed (PU). Default: 0.0

feedbackSignal.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Feedback signal selection (Sw). true = PID Output (if R-Perm-Gate=droop and R-Perm-Pe=0) false = Electrical Power (if R-Perm-Gate=0 and R-Perm-Pe=droop) or false = Gate Position (if R-Perm-Gate=droop and R-Perm-Pe=0). Default: False

fl1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Flow Gate 1 (Fl1).  Flow value for gate position point 1 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

fl2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Flow Gate 2 (Fl2).  Flow value for gate position point 2 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

fl3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Flow Gate 3 (Fl3).  Flow value for gate position point 3 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

fl4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Flow Gate 4 (Fl4).  Flow value for gate position point 4 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

fl5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Flow Gate 5 (Fl5).  Flow value for gate position point 5 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

fp1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Flow P1 (Fp1).  Turbine Flow value for point 1 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

fp10.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Flow P10 (Fp10).  Turbine Flow value for point 10 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

fp2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Flow P2 (Fp2).  Turbine Flow value for point 2 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

fp3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Flow P3 (Fp3).  Turbine Flow value for point 3 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

fp4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Flow P4 (Fp4).  Turbine Flow value for point 4 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

fp5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Flow P5 (Fp5).  Turbine Flow value for point 5 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

fp6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Flow P6 (Fp6).  Turbine Flow value for point 6 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

fp7.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Flow P7 (Fp7).  Turbine Flow value for point 7 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

fp8.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Flow P8 (Fp8).  Turbine Flow value for point 8 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

fp9.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Flow P9 (Fp9).  Turbine Flow value for point 9 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

gmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum Gate Position (Gmax). Default: 0.0

gmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum Gate Position (Gmin). Default: 0.0

gtmxcl.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum gate closing rate (Gtmxcl). Default: 0.0

gtmxop.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum gate opening rate (Gtmxop). Default: 0.0

gv1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gate 1 (Gv1).  Gate Position value for point 1 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

gv2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gate 2 (Gv2).  Gate Position value for point 2 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

gv3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gate 3 (Gv3).  Gate Position value for point 3 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

gv4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gate 4 (Gv4).  Gate Position value for point 4 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

gv5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gate 5 (Gv5).  Gate Position value for point 5 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

kd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Derivative controller derivative gain (Kd). Default: 0.0

ki.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Derivative controller Integral gain (Ki). Default: 0.0

kp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Derivative control gain (Kp). Default: 0.0

mwbase.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Base for power values (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

pmss1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pmss Flow P1 (Pmss1).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 1 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

pmss10.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pmss Flow P10 (Pmss10).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 10 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

pmss2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pmss Flow P2 (Pmss2).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 2 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

pmss3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pmss Flow P3 (Pmss3).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 3 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

pmss4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pmss Flow P4 (Pmss4).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 4 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

pmss5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pmss Flow P5 (Pmss5).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 5 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

pmss6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pmss Flow P6 (Pmss6).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 6 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

pmss7.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pmss Flow P7 (Pmss7).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 7 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

pmss8.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pmss Flow P8 (Pmss8).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 8 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

pmss9.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pmss Flow P9 (Pmss9).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 9 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

rpg.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Permanent droop for governor output feedback (R-Perm-Gate). Default: 0.0

rpp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Permanent droop for electrical power feedback (R-Perm-Pe). Default: 0.0

td.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Derivative controller time constant to limit the derivative characteristic beyond a breakdown frequency to avoid amplification of high-frequency noise (Td). Default: 0

tdv.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Distributive Valve time lag time constant (Tdv). Default: 0

tg.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Value to allow the Distribution valve controller to advance beyond the gate movement rate limit (Tg). Default: 0

tp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pilot Valve time lag time constant (Tp). Default: 0

tpe.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Electrical power droop time constant (Tpe). Default: 0

tw.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Water inertia time constant (Tw) (>0). Default: 0
